channel.title: LoLcRaFt ip:lolcraft.servebeer.com
channel.description:
ip: lolcraft.servebeer.com
Description: LoLcRaFt is a cool server made by me, lol767. In this server we have ranks. If you register at lolcraft.forumfacil.net , you will become a member. If you show excellent behaviour and show that you help a lot, you will become a helper. After helper comes moderator. Thats the highest rank you can get. Grief and become a griefer or be banned. If you enter for the first time, you get a stone pick, stone axe, stone shovel, stone sword and becomes Unregistered. Come and join, the #1 Brazilian Server! Ip Address: lolcraft.servebeer.com Recommend LoLcRaFt on google plus on the site, mclolblog.co.cc Vote! Vote at www.mclolblog.co.cc/p/vote-for-us.html You win $100 for each vote! Hope to see you there! We now have the PvP server! When you enter, you are a member but to become a member++, you have to register at lolcraft.forumfacil.net ===================================================== Main Server: main-lc.co.cc / lolcraft.servebeer.com PvP Server: pvp-lc.co.cc:9823 / lolcraft.servebeer.com:9823 Forums: lolcraft.forumfacil.net Blog: mclolblog.co.cc Vote: www.mclolblog.co.cc/p/vote-for-us.html TeamSpeak: lolcraft.servebeer.com Go to the forums to know the password =====================================================
